column4: Ubuntu ver 6.06 LTS comes in 2 forms: the regular one and the 64bit one. I have an AMD 64 Athlon computer. Does this mean I should install the 64 bit one?
Not necessarily. Is all the software you want available for the AMD64 platform?
64bit should be better (you can use more than 4GB of System memory for a start) but it's only the software that really holds it back, if at all.
Type the first few letters of the name and use tab to complete.
